tns:projectTemplate.name: AS3 + Flex4 HTML Embed
tns:projectTemplate.description:
This template includes the HTML wrapper that is shipped with the Flex 4 SDK.
To get started: 1. Modify the 'template-build.properties' file to match your project settings. 2. Right click on 'template-build.xml' and select 'Run As>Ant Build'.
After that, just have your launcher point to the generated .html file and set your browser as the Viewer. For more info and a video tutorial go to: http://fdt.powerflasher.com/blog/2010/03/fdt-html-template/
